intervention.action: Denied additional withdrawals and reported to DFPI

extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL HIGH VALUE: $930K combined loss. Victim 2 was elderly with diminished mental capacity - vulnerable population targeting. Financial advisory firm intervened and prevented additional $260K loss. UC Berkeley alumni connection used as social engineering hook.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Fergus Lee contacted victim 1 on LinkedIn; Female 'UC Berkeley student' contacted elderly victim 2
chain_of_thought.step_2_trust_building: Used college alumni connection to build trust with victim 2
chain_of_thought.step_3_platform_setup: Showed victims how to set up Crypto.com accounts and transfer to Liquldohn
chain_of_thought.step_4_proof_of_concept: Victim 1: $1,000 investment returned $607 on first trade
chain_of_thought.step_5_escalation: Victim 1 withdrew from 401K ($50K); Victim 2 transferred $880K from bank
chain_of_thought.step_6_intervention: Financial firm detected fraud, denied trust/IRA withdrawals, reported to DFPI
